title: Can"t cast abilitys it just pings when i left click
body:
Sometimes whenever i use an ability instead of casting it pings anyone else have this happening?
It is weird af.

replies.body: Are you using any voice chat applications that run in the background? I've seen some weird af interactions when using Discord, Skype, Curse Voice, or mumble with League. If so, disable or completely close out that program to see if you still get these weird interactions.
its probably discord XD duo q too good
